ratings.comment: Horrible. Went into every exam thinking I was well prepared, came out of every exam wanting to cry. Exams are impossible and do not relate to homework or lecture.  He is very hard to understand and the TAs are useless.

one of the bad professors. I used to love math, and got an A in 211, but this guy just ruined it for me. Exams were so hard i wanted to cry. Went to office hours, was useless. Textbook used only for hw, not worth buying.

WORST professor i have ever had.  Class was pointless and wrote so much on the board it couldn't be read.  this was the lowest grade i have ever received in a class in college.  the homework was unrelated to the exams.  Exam 1 was impossible the second was not bad and the final was impossible.

Writes non-stop on the board and never stops for questions in lecture. First exam was impossible, second exam was fair, and final was impossible. You can know how to do everything in the book and still feel like you failed. Poor comminucation between TAs and professor also, frustrating.
Impossible to keep up or understand. Tests are equally impossible
lectures are dreadful. he cannot explain a single thing. mumbles under his breathe about what he's doing on the board. he's extremely intelligent but cant teach worth anything.

The worst professor I've ever had. He speeds through lectures while quietly mumbling with a thick accent. If you ask a question in class, he does not clearly answer it. Tests are impossible!! He spends so much time making sure his handwriting is perfect,by the time he moves for you to be able to write notes your so far behind you can't follow along

Worst class ever! I wish I could have withdrawn as well. Too late now unfortunately. Exams impossible, homework a problems given that require use of a calculator when it is not required for the class or exam so what's the point!!! So frustrating to say the least..

This is the worst professor I've ever had. He's a smart man, but he has no clue how to teach. He speeds through examples in lectures, and mumbles a lot. His tests are nearly impossible. I wish I would have withdrew when I still could.

Goes through the material extremely fast and has a hard-to-understand voice. Homework is absolutely ridiculous and far more advanced than anything in the textbook. Exams are doable, but overall, he is not a good professor. TA was unhelpful as well.

This professor is impossible to learn from. He goes at an extremely fast rate during lecture. Tests are ridiculous. They are much harder than what's in the textbook and what he teaches in lecture.  TA wasn't much help either. Attendance is taken in discussion.
Terrible teacher.  Didn't learn anything from him.  Very inarticulate professor.  Thankfully his contract will not be renewed.
HW given is not related to textbook
